projects.title: (make) Intelligent Telegram Customer Service Chatbot
projects.shortDescription: Telegram chatbot as a smart customer service solution.
projects.problem: Customer service teams are overwhelmed with inquiries, leading to delayed responses and missed opportunities to address negative feedback before it escalates.
projects.solution: An automated Telegram chatbot that intelligently triages customer messages using sentiment analysis. Positive messages receive instant AI-powered responses, while negative messages trigger immediate email alerts to human support staff - ensuring no unhappy customer goes unnoticed.
keyFeatures: Start Sentiment Detection: Automatically analyzes incoming messages to determine customer mood
Instant Positive Response: Provides immediate, helpful replies to satisfied customers
Negative Feedback Alerts: Sends real-time email notifications to team members when issues arise
Seamless Integration: Built on Make.com for reliable automation and easy maintenance
Different languages supported (using Gemini LLM)
Can be added to groups

futureCustomizations.customAiPrompts: Businesses can tailor the chatbot's personality and response style to match their brand voice - from formal banking responses to casual e-commerce interactions.
futureCustomizations.faqIntegration: Add a knowledge base node that pulls answers from company-specific FAQ documents, ensuring accurate and consistent information delivery.
futureCustomizations.multiChannelRouting: Expand beyond sentiment analysis with intelligent routing based on keywords, urgency levels, or customer tiers - directing VIP customers to priority queues or technical issues to specialized teams.

projects.title: (n8n) Automated Lead Follow-up System
projects.shortDescription: This automated Lead Follow-Up System is a flexible automation template designed to handle one of the most critical aspects of business: consistent and timely follow-up with your potential customers!
projects.problem: It takes too much time to keep track of new potential customers (leads). Sometimes we're slow to reply to them. This means we might miss out on sales.
projects.solution: I built an automatic system to talk to new leads. It makes sure we respond fast and always send the right message. This saves time and helps us get more customers!
benefits: More Sales: Helps us turn 35-65% more leads into customers by talking to them regularly.
Saves Time: Frees up 3-7 hours each week that used to be spent manually dealing with leads.
Fast Replies: We reply to leads in minutes, not hours or days.
Clear Messages: All our messages to potential customers are consistent and clear.
Learn What Works: It shows us which messages and timing work best, so we can keep getting better.
workflow: New Lead Appears: When a new lead is added (like in a spreadsheet), the system instantly notices.
First Email: It immediately sends a welcome email to the new lead.
Update Status: The system marks the lead's status to show they've received the first email.
Watches for Replies: It keeps an eye out for any emails back from the lead.
Status Changes: If the lead replies, their status is changed to "Responded" right away.

Smart Follow-Up: The system waits for 3 days. After 3 days, it checks if the lead has replied. If they HAVEN'T replied: It sends a follow-up email. If they HAVE replied: It does nothing, because a person can take over from there.

projects.title: (n8n) Custom AI Customer and Order support chatbot
projects.shortDescription: Developed an intelligent customer service chatbot for a Shopify store using n8n workflow automation, integrating Google Gemini AI to provide personalized customer support.

architecture: AI agent processes inquiries using contextual prompts
Shopify integration retrieves order status and product information

keyFeatures: Contextual Responses: AI trained on specific website content and service offerings
Order Management: Real-time order status retrieval from Shopify
Conversation Memory: Maintains chat history for personalized interactions
Custom Prompting: Tailored responses based on business context (Mara Baraha store)
businessImpact: Automated Support: Reduces manual customer service workload
24/7 Availability: Instant responses to customer inquiries
Consistent Information: Ensures accurate product and service details
Scalable Solution: Handles multiple conversations simultaneously
technicalSkills: AI model integration and prompt engineering

projects.title: (n8n) Google Maps Scraper
projects.shortDescription: Built an automated data extraction system that scrapes business information from Google Maps using n8n workflow automation, with integrated data processing and Google Sheets storage.

architecture: SerpAPI integration for Google Maps data extraction
Google Sheets integration for data storage and management

keyFeatures: Automated Scheduling: Configurable time-based execution
Keyword & Location Extraction: Scrapes businesses based on search terms and geographic location
Data Processing Pipeline: Extracts next start values for pagination, Merges and transforms raw data, Removes duplicates and empty records, Formats data for storage
Google Sheets Integration: Automatically populates spreadsheet with cleaned data
Error Handling: Built-in status updates and loop completion detection
businessApplications: Lead Generation: Collect business contact information for sales prospecting
Market Research: Analyze competitor locations and business density
Data Analytics: Build databases for business intelligence
Location Intelligence: Map business distributions across geographic areas

projects.title: (n8n) Seamless Calendar: Telegram Booking Assistant for Service Businesses
projects.description: Built this automation via n8n and Telegram!
toolsConnected: OpenAI LLM - to process user messages and craft a response
Window Buffer Memory - to save context
coreFunctions: Allows to set events to Google Calendar via messaging a Telegram bot
Has capabilities to retrieve existing events from Google Calendar
Uses AI to interpret natural language requests and convert them into calendar actions
Features built-in guardrails to ensure proper functioning and prevent misuse
Maintains a conversation memory to provide context-aware responses
projects.benefit: This automation eliminates the need to switch between apps, allowing users to manage their schedule seamlessly through Telegram messages.
possibleUseCases: Restaurant Reservation System: Customers could message the bot to check availability, make reservations, and receive confirmation—all through Telegram. The system could automatically update your Google Calendar with bookings.
Spa Appointment Scheduler: Clients could book treatments, check available time slots, and receive reminders about upcoming appointments.
Staff Schedule Management: Help staff check their upcoming shifts or appointments directly through Telegram.
Service Customization: Collect customer preferences (like dietary restrictions for restaurants or treatment preferences for spas) through guided conversation flows.

projects.title: (n8n) X post generator and publisher
projects.shortDescription: n8n automation that will generate and publish content to your X account!
projects.description: This n8n automation is designed to generate and publish content to X (formerly Twitter). The workflow consists of these main steps:
workflowSteps: Enter Title Topic: The workflow begins with a form input where you enter the topic or title for your X post.

Generate AI Content: Using OpenAI Chat Model, the automation generates content based on your provided topic. It includes a "Format AI Output" component to structure the generated content properly for X.
Post to X: The workflow then automatically posts the generated content to your X account using the "create:tweet" action.
Show Confirmation: Finally, it displays a confirmation that your post has been published successfully.
projects.benefit: This automation streamlines the content creation and publishing process for X, allowing you to quickly generate AI-powered posts without having to manually write and publish them yourself.

projects.title: Automated a Shopify Giveaway with Social Boost and ActiveCampaign(CRM)
projects.shortDescription: I planned and executed a fully automated giveaway for a Shopify store using the Social Boost app.
projects.description: I planned and executed a fully automated giveaway for a Shopify store using the Social Boost app that delivered exceptional results. I built a custom landing page in Shopify, configured viral sharing features, and integrated it with ActiveCampaign to capture and segment leads automatically.

additionalInsights: The giveaway drove 526 unique visitors and 4,900 website visits
Strong engagement including 173 likes and 351 comments on the main Instagram post

projects.note: The campaign generated remarkable growth with zero manual work post-launch.

projects.title: Client Onboarding Automation Workflow
projects.problem: Busy teams waste hours on repetitive onboarding tasks - creating folders, updating spreadsheets, sending welcome emails, and manual notifications.
projects.solution: This automated workflow eliminates manual work by connecting your existing Google Suite tools. When a new client submits a form, the system automatically: Creates organized client folders, Adds client data to your tracking database, Sends personalized welcome emails, Updates team spreadsheets, Triggers internal notifications, Sends progress updates via Telegram
projects.builtFor: Teams using Google Suite who want to save time on small but time-consuming manual tasks.
benefits: Fully customizable to your business needs
Scalable as your client base grows
Works with tools you already use
Saves 2-3 hours per client onboarding
projects.techStack: Make.com, Google Forms, Google Sheets, Gmail, Telegram

projects.title: Multiple Lead Magnet Automation(WP-ActiveCampaign)
projects.shortDescription: This is a lead magnet automation that delivers requested content while simultaneously segmenting contacts based on their interests and behaviors for future marketing campaigns.
projects.problem: My client's WordPress form wasn't connected to ActiveCampaign, resulting in lost leads and manual work. Their team was manually sending PDFs to prospects who requested them, causing delays and inconsistent follow-up.
projects.solution: I built a custom form directly in ActiveCampaign and designed this automation workflow to automatically deliver different PDF resources based on the contact's profile and needs. The workflow: Triggers immediately when someone submits on the new form requesting a PDF download, Uses conditional logic to route contacts through appropriate pathways based on their information, Automatically sends targeted emails with the relevant PDF (Sales, PM, or HR versions) attached, Tags contacts based on which resource they downloaded for better segmentation
projects.results: This automation eliminated the manual process completely. Now when prospects request information, they receive the appropriate PDF instantly. Their team saves approximately 5-10 hours per week that was previously spent on manual follow-ups.

projects.title: RSS-to-Multi-Platform Content Automation
projects.shortDescription: Built automated content creation system using Make.com that monitors an RSS feed and generates platform-specific social media content.
keyFeatures: RSS feed monitoring
AI-powered content generation for multiple channels
Platform optimization for YouTube, Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn
Automated Google Docs integration for content storage
Custom prompting for brand-consistent messaging
projects.results: Reduced manual content creation time by 90% while maintaining consistent posting across 6+ social platforms.

projects.title: Shopify Customization: Show Retail & Trade Pricing for Approved Customers
projects.shortDescription: Shopify customizations to fit your needs
projects.useCase: When a customer with the tag "Approved Trade" logs into the Shopify storefront, they should see both: the Retail Price (RRP), and a special Trade Price (e.g., 20% off retail). This visibility should occur on: Product pages, Cart page, Collection pages (product cards)
projects.problem: Shopify does not natively support dual pricing per customer group on product or collection pages. Metafields such as trade_discount were already set up for variants, but: Only retail price displayed by default, The theme (Prestige) did not show trade pricing on product cards or collection views, Cart showed only retail prices
projects.solution: We implemented the following: Display RRP and Trade Price on Product Cards (Collections Page), Suppress Unnecessary Sale Price Block, Cart Page Trade Pricing Support, Created trade-pricing.liquid Snippet for Reusability
projects.result: Logged-in Trade customers now see: RRP and Trade Pricing on product cards, Trade prices in Cart (automatically calculated), Sale blocks hidden to avoid redundancy. This improves pricing transparency for Trade customers without interfering with standard retail experience.

requiredMetafields: Product Metafields: custom.trade_price (money) - Optional: Custom trade price
Product Metafields: custom.trade_discount (number) - Optional: Discount percentage

projects.notes: Trade discount logic is based on a trade_discount metafield per variant. No automatic discount codes or cart-level discounts are applied — pricing is modified directly. Tested with Prestige theme

projects.title: Shopify Liquid Customizations
projects.shortDescription: Shopify customizations to improve lead generation
projects.problem: Prestige Theme default newsletter form only collects an email address, which limits personalization and segmentation. There's no built-in option for capturing first and last names — something most email marketing tools benefit from.
projects.solution: We added two supported fields — contact[first_name] and contact[last_name] — directly to the newsletter form. These are recognized by Shopify and passed properly to their CRM.
projects.result: Visitors can now enter their first name, last name, and email in your newsletter form. Shopify stores this information under the customer's profile. Your email marketing tools (e.g., ActiveCampaign) receive full contact details without extra setup.
projects.whyThisMatters: This small update improves personalization, supports better email segmentation, and makes your list far more useful — without requiring extra scripts or apps.

projects.title: Website Engagement & Nurturing Automations
projects.shortDescription: 3 powerful CRM automations we can do to nurture and track your leads engagement

automations.name: Track lead engagement on the website
automations.description: This automation begins when a contact submits any form. It then checks if the contact has previously visited the photography section of our website. If they have visited the photography page, the automation ends, indicating they've already shown interest. If they haven't visited the photography page, they receive a series of three emails (one per day) designed to promote website content. After these emails, the automation sets a "GOAL: Interested in Photography" and then ends. This flow helps us identify and nurture potential leads interested in photography, guiding them towards a specific goal based on their engagement.

automations.name: Interest Nurturing & Sales Automation
automations.description: This automation is triggered when a "Photography" tag is added to a contact. It first waits until a weekday at 9 AM in the contact's timezone. Then, it sends a series of four "Photography Outreach" emails over several days. After these emails, the "Photography" tag is removed, and a "GOAL: PURCHASED" is set, implying a desired conversion. Finally, an "Upsell - Photography" tag is added, and the contact is entered into another automation called "Made a Purchase" before this automation concludes. This flow is designed to nurture contacts tagged with "Photography" towards a purchase and then transition them into a post-purchase or upsell sequence.

automations.name: Lead Qualification & Management Automation
automations.description: This automation starts when a "Photography" tag is added to a contact. It immediately checks if the contact is already in any stage of a "Business Pipeline." If the contact is already in a deal stage, the automation ends, preventing duplicate efforts. If the contact is not in a deal stage, a new deal named "New Photography Lead" is created for them, and two "Call" tasks are added to this deal. The automation then waits for 30 days. After this waiting period, it checks if the contact's deal has moved to the "Qualified Lead" stage within the "Business Pipeline." If the deal has been moved to "Qualified Lead," it's then moved to "Cold Leads: No Response," and the automation ends. This suggests a follow-up or a re-engagement strategy for leads that became qualified but might not have progressed further. If the deal has not been moved to "Qualified Lead," the automation ends, indicating that the lead did not progress as expected within the 30-day period. This automation streamlines the process of qualifying new photography leads, assigning follow-up tasks, and managing their progression within a sales pipeline.

projects.title: (n8n) AI-Powered Interview Answer Grading Workflow
projects.shortDescription: AI coach that grades interview answers using STAR method, provides feedback, and generates improved responses - all synced with Google Sheets for easy practice tracking.
projects.problem: Interview candidates struggle to self-assess their answers objectively. Manual feedback takes time and isn't scalable. Difficult to track progress across multiple practice sessions. Hard to know if answers follow proper STAR method structure.
projects.solution: Built an automated interview coaching system that reads practice answers from Google Sheets, uses OpenAI to grade them against STAR methodology, provides detailed feedback, and generates improved versions. The system handles behavioral, hypothetical, and generic questions with customized scoring criteria for each type.
benefits: Instant feedback on interview answers (vs. hours waiting for human review)
Consistent, objective grading based on STAR methodology
Automated improved answer generation for faster learning
Complete practice history tracked in Google Sheets
Scores 45 questions in ~5 minutes

projects.title: (n8n) ActiveCampaign Account Auto-Update System
projects.shortDescription: Automatically syncs trade signup data from Airtable to ActiveCampaign, keeping contact records updated with the latest account details in real-time.
projects.problem: Manual data entry between Airtable and ActiveCampaign is time-consuming. Contact information gets outdated quickly. Risk of human error when copying data between systems. No way to automatically filter and update specific contact segments.
projects.solution: Created an automated sync workflow that monitors ActiveCampaign lists, filters for specific signup types (trade signups), pulls matching records from Airtable, and updates ActiveCampaign contact fields automatically. The system ensures data consistency across both platforms.
benefits: Zero manual data entry required
Real-time contact updates (vs. daily/weekly manual syncs)
Reduced data errors from manual copying
Automatic filtering for specific contact segments
Saves ~3-5 hours per week on data management

projects.title: (n8n) AI Email Draft Generator
projects.shortDescription: Automated email response system that monitors Outlook folders, generates professional draft replies using AI, and organizes emails for review - saving hours of daily email management.
projects.problem: High volume of emails requiring personalized responses. Time-consuming to draft professional replies for each message. Difficult to prioritize and organize incoming emails. Repetitive email writing takes focus away from core tasks.
projects.solution: Created an intelligent email assistant that runs hourly, checks three designated Outlook folders (Review, To Respond, Greg), analyzes unread emails, and generates professional draft responses using GPT-4o. Drafts are automatically created in Outlook and original emails moved to an organized folder for final review.
benefits: Saves 2-3 hours daily on email drafting
Professional, consistent tone across all responses
Automatic email organization and prioritization
Drafts ready for quick review and send
Never miss an email that needs response

projects.title: (n8n) YouTube Video Clipping Automation
projects.shortDescription: Automated video clipping workflow that submits YouTube videos to Vizard AI, monitors processing status, and extracts optimized short-form clips for social media distribution.
projects.problem: Manual video clipping is time-intensive. Finding the best moments in long videos requires watching entire content. Inconsistent clip quality and length across social platforms. No systematic way to track video processing status.
projects.solution: Built an automated pipeline that submits YouTube videos to Vizard.ai API for AI-powered clipping, waits for processing completion, checks status automatically, and retrieves optimized clips. The system handles API authentication, error checking, and provides status updates throughout the process.
benefits: Zero manual video editing required
AI identifies best moments automatically (up to 8 clips per video)
Consistent 2-minute clip format optimized for social media
Automatic status monitoring (no need to manually check)
Saves 3-5 hours per video on clipping and editing

projects.title: (Zapier) Pending Invoice Reminder Sender
projects.shortDescription: Automated payment reminder system that sends personalized emails to customers with outstanding invoices, with automatic record tracking.
projects.problem: Manual invoice follow-up takes hours each week. Customers forget to pay pending invoices without reminders. Inconsistent payment reminder communication. No systematic way to track which reminders have been sent. Risk of sending duplicate reminders or missing overdue invoices.
projects.solution: Built an automated Zapier agent that runs daily at 9:00 AM, checks Google Sheets for pending invoices, filters for reminders that haven't been sent, generates personalized email messages with customer names and payment links, sends friendly branded reminders via Gmail, and updates the spreadsheet to track communication status.
benefits: Saves 3-5 hours weekly on manual invoice follow-ups
Faster payments with automated daily reminders
Personalized communication includes customer name, amount, and payment link
No duplicate reminders with automatic tracking in spreadsheet
Improved cash flow through consistent follow-up
Professional brand voice with Tart-led friendly tone

projects.title: (GoHighLevel) Instagram Auto DM & Lead Qualifier
projects.shortDescription: Automated Instagram engagement system that likes comments, sends personalized DMs, qualifies leads through conversation, and delivers booking links to interested prospects.
projects.problem: Instagram comments are engagement opportunities going to waste. Manually DMing every commenter is impossible to scale. Leads get cold while waiting for manual follow-up. No systematic way to qualify leads before sending booking links. Missing out on hot leads who comment but never take next step. Team spends hours copying/pasting the same DM sequences.
projects.solution: Built an intelligent GoHighLevel automation that monitors both Instagram and Facebook comments, automatically likes each comment for engagement, sends personalized welcome DMs, guides prospects through qualifying questions using interactive messenger, and delivers the booking link only to qualified leads - all while the business owner sleeps.
benefits: Instant engagement - Comments liked and DMs sent within seconds
Higher conversion rates - Strike while leads are hot
Automated lead qualification - Only qualified leads get booking links
Works 24/7 - Never miss a comment, even at 3 AM
Scales infinitely - Handle 10 or 1000 comments with same effort
Saves 10-15 hours weekly on manual DM responses
Consistent messaging - Every lead gets the same quality experience
Multi-platform - Works for both Instagram and Facebook comments
